pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, August 26, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with a family to discuss the COVID-19 situation and the return to school this fall. An announcement and media availability will follow.

Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen, Deputy Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Kirsty Duncan, and Member of Parliament for Humber River—Black Creek Judy Sgro will be in attendance.

Yorkwoods Public School
25 Yorkwoods Gate, North York

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of the meeting
  • Open coverage of the announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m. at entrance #7.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
